name: TribeTalk-ClevelandBaseball
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
I'm just a passionate Indians fan with plenty of opinions that i usually keep to myself. But that is no more! I will give daily updates and/or news with a mix of humor and opinion. I love Baseball and I love the Indians. I watch and/or listen to just about every game. (Tom Hamilton is the best in the game........EVER!!) Hope you enjoy.

Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
